title: Jermaine O'Neal
summary: Jermaine Lee O'Neal Sr. (born October 13, 1978) is an American former professional basketball player. The centerâ€“power forward had a successful high school career and declared his eligibility for the 1996 NBA draft straight out of high school. O'Neal, at just 17 years of age, was selected by the Portland Trail Blazers with the 17th overall pick, and played his first professional game at 18. At the time, he was the youngest player to ever play an NBA game.
